mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tb_inspection_detail (inspection_id, property_id, property_name, place_id, place_name, `time`, step, start_time, end_time, duration, `status`, record_id, content) values (#{inspectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{propertyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{propertyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{placeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{placeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{step,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_inspection_detail set inspection_id = #{inspectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, property_id = #{propertyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, property_name = #{propertyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, place_id = #{placeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, place_name = #{placeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `time` = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, step = #{step,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, inspection_id, property_id, property_name, place_id, place_name, `time`, step, start_time, end_time, duration, `status`, record_id, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, content from tb_inspection_detail where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, inspection_id, property_id, property_name, place_id, place_name, `time`, step, start_time, end_time, duration, `status`, record_id, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, content from tb_inspection_detail

SELECT * FROM tb_inspection_detail detail
FIND_IN_SET(detail.`status`, #{statuses})
AND FIND_IN_SET(detail.`status`, #{excludeStatuses}) = 0
AND FIND_IN_SET(detail.step, #{steps})
AND FIND_IN_SET(detail.place_id, #{placeIds})
AND FIND_IN_SET(detail.property_id, #{propertyIds})
AND FIND_IN_SET(detail.inspection_id, #{inspectionIds})
AND detail.`time` >= #{startTime}
AND detail.`time` <= #{endTime}
AND detail.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{like}, '%')
